values: I knew this day would come. I knew, eventually, someone would pass me some sort of virus, and here it is. I can no longer speak, my eyes are watering uncontrollably, and my head is pounding. Of course, universities are a prime breeding place for disease. If someone would fetch me some tea, I would be mighty grateful. Oh, and it seems I missed a stripping session in the halls. Lovely, just lovely. Note to Self: never ever venture out of the dorm room without a firearm present. It seems we are stuck together, and as much as I protest, it seems we will be seeing each other quite often. So, as a result of this, I suppose I owe you can apology. However, don't expect me to socialize with you.

Oh, I do apologize. It seems that this network is full of busy-bodies. Oh lovely. Perhaps next time you should learn to keep yourself out of a situation that doesn't concern you. Yes, I do believe that would be a wise decision on your part. Note to Self: code: 684332 access: ju.shinra main frame lock: a7546shinra87 main frame access: a623jushinra It's debut is the 28th of March. Contact the Turks before then.

I demand a private room.

This establishment does not seem to understand the severity of the situation. I require a private room to preform duties for my business back home. Thus, I cannot have some infestation hovering over me when I am trying to calculate finances and what-have-you. In conclusion, if my room is not changed in the next twenty-four hours, I will seek else where to live.

- Rufus J. Shinra

P.S: Consider any funding terminated until this is resolved.
Oh lovely. They've sent them here as well. My, my, my. Paranoid, aren't we?

And so comes another round of incompetence.

Marvelous. I'll be locked away in my dorm, thank you.
